test_info.description: Comprehensive coverage with balanced difficulty levels and cross-module integration

questions.question_text: A balanced 3-phase system has line voltage 400V and line current 20A at 0.8 power factor lagging. Calculate total apparent power.
questions.explanation: For 3-phase system: S = √3 × VL × IL = √3 × 400 × 20 = 13,856 VA = 13.86 kVA

questions.question_text: A generator has H = 5 seconds on 100MVA base. If rating is 200MVA, find H on machine base.
questions.explanation: H on machine base = H on given base × (Machine MVA/Given base MVA) = 5 × (200/100) = 10 seconds
